extends Shape

      • Parallelogram

        Parallelogram(int x,
              int y,
              java.awt.Color c,
              int sideOne,
              int sideTwo,
              int height)
       throws NotShapeException
        Constructs a new Parallelogram Object
        Parameters:
        x - the x value of the coordinate of the Parallelogram
        y - the y value of the coordinate of the Parallelogram
        c - the color of the Parallelogram
        sideOne - one of the side lengths of the Parallelogram
        sideTwo - the other side length of the Parallelogram
        height - the height of the Parallelogram
        Throws:
        NotShapeException - if the dimensions can not make the desired shape
